thread.section_title: Hardware Source Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hardware Source | www.hardwaresource.com | 5 of 370
thread.title: Satisfied customer
thread.title_full: Hardware Source reviewed by Satisfied customer

author: Satisfied customer
title: Satisfied customer
text: I couldn't find a 1/4" overlay hinge at any local hardware store. Hardware Source had a lot of options and great install instructions. The only thing I wish they did was include all the screws I needed for install. I saw after making my purchase that there was supposed to be an option to buy them but it didn't stand out to me when checking out so I missed the opportunity. Otherwise, they look awesome and are working great!
